Adventure Helper: All right. To sum up a minute. You have to kill Stakato Singles, Singles Stakato Workers, Singles Stakato Soldier Singles Stakato Drones, Needle Stakato, Needle Stakato Workers, Needle Stakato Soldier, Needle Stakato Drone, Soldier and Reservoir Stakato Stakato Drone Reservoir , then collect 80 carapace Stakato and take them Mercenary Supplier Abercrombie in the Swamp of Screams . I think it is time you put forward there. You understand? Long live the journey!
